title: S7E12 – "Grave Tales" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you five spine-chilling tales from author Christopher Maxim, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about sinister science, eerie instruments, odd advice, unusual occupations, and unforgettable fear.

                       

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
